author: liquan.eth
content: I also received a letter of rejection, but I am grateful to be able to participate in this project in a permissionless manner

author: andersonchen
content: <@350513362423250945> That's an interesting story. Thanks for sharing

author: timbeiko
content: We'll 100% get applicants wrong - there are sooo many, and a large % are "good or better" - we then rely on various imperfect signals to try and triage through them. We're aware of that, and hope that our design of the program allows people to prove us wrong - like they have in previous batches ğŸ˜„
